content:
EDIT:

* Added SHORTEST mode because this is a good task to compress code with

* Changed some [[variables]] to {{constants}} and vice-versa

It should be more clear that there is a space before and after the "/". Also, you should either add a negative N and/or M and specify the resulting behaviour or modify your constraints to "N and M are positive integers." Also make sure to state that division by 0 will not happen.

I'd like to approve your puzzle, then. :)
Ok thanks for the suggestions. I will try to implement them. :)
